title: Teito Monogatari (Doomed Megalopolis)
synopsis: When an evil sorcerer bent on crushing the "greatest city on earth" uses dark powers to awaken the destructive spirit of Tokyo's historic "guardian," Taira no Masakado, occultists, children, and scientists become embroiled in a ruinous struggle spanning two decades.
characters: ['Katou, Yasunori', 'Tatsumiya, Yukari', 'Mikata, Keiko', 'Narutaki, Junichi', 'Mori, Ogai ', 'Rohan, Kouda', 'Mekata, Shin', 'Kyouka, Izumi', 'Astronomer A', 'Amano, Junkichi']
voices: ['Shimada, Kyusaku', 'Han, Keiko', 'Ichiryuusai, Harumi', 'Yamadera, Kouichi', 'Sasaoka, Shigezou', 'Yara, Yuusaku', 'Yada, Kouji', 'Okiayu, Ryoutarou', 'Kitamura, Kouichi']
